node.label:
the whole structure is stored entirely in one field in table Large OBject (for example XML)
-each dependent object SHOULD BELONG only to it's owner - in the resulting graph of dependent objects, dependent can not be referenced outside (only through the main object) - change dependent object marks the parent as a change
GoF pattern: MEMENTO
node.documentation: gang of four classic design pattern

node.label: - mapper of the main object controls the dependent objects - dependent objects are loaded automatically with the main
database
node.documentation: gang of four classic design pattern

node.label: one row contains Primary Key column and column for XML (which keep all objects with dependencies)
